summary: The opening scene of the movie describes it best: "Once upon a time there lived in Denmark a great storyteller named Hans Christian Andersen. This is not the story of his life, but a fairy tale about the great spinner of fairy tales."
cast: Danny Kaye|Farley Granger|Zizi Jeanmaire|Joseph Walsh|Philip Tonge|Erik Bruhn|Roland Petit|John Brown|John Qualen|Jeanne Lafayette|Robert Malcolm|George Chandler|Fred Kelsey|Gil Perkins|Peter J. Votrian|Lee Aaker|Arthur Berkeley|Billy Bevan|Chet Brandenburg|Lonnie Burr|Wheaton Chambers|Barrie Chase|Jack Claus|Noreen Corcoran|Michael Cowan|George Davis|Pepe De Chazza|Edith Evanson|Franklyn Farnum|Jack Gargan|Slim Gaut|Jack George|Karolyn Grimes|Frank Hagney|Joan Haig|Stanley Hall|Sam Harris|Tommy Ivo|Joan Larkin|Rudy Lee|Sylvia Lewis|Ray Linn Jr.|Allen D. Sewall|Pat Tribble|Betty Utey|Beverly Washburn
title: El fabuloso Andersen
